templates.name: Title and description
templates.description: Add a title to your README

options.label: Main Title (h1)
options.content:
# Title

A brief description of what this project does and who it's for

options.label: Secondary Title (h2)
options.content:
## Title

A brief description of what this project does and who it's for

options.label: Subsection Title (h3)
options.content:
### Title

A brief description of what this project does and who it's for

options.label: Basic Installation
options.content:
1. Clone the repository
2. Run `npm install`
3. Start the application with `npm start`

options.label: Intermediate Installation
options.content:
1. Clone the repository
2. Install dependencies with `npm install`
3. Set up environment variables
4. Start the application with `npm start`

options.label: Advanced Installation
options.content:
1. Clone the repository
2. Install dependencies with `npm install`
3. Set up environment variables
4. Build the project with `npm run build`
5. Start the application with `npm start`

options.label: Basic Usage
options.content:
1. Run `npm start`
2. Open your browser at `http://localhost:3000`

options.label: Intermediate Usage
options.content:
1. Run `npm start`
2. Access the API at `http://localhost:3000/api`
3. View the frontend at `http://localhost:3000`

options.label: Advanced Usage
options.content:
1. Run `npm start`
2. Access the API at `http://localhost:3000/api`
3. View the frontend at `http://localhost:3000`
4. Monitor logs with `npm run logs`

options.label: Basic Contributing
options.content:
1. Fork the repository
2. Create a new branch
3. Make your changes
4. Submit a pull request

options.label: Intermediate Contributing
options.content:
1. Fork the repository
2. Create a new branch based on `develop`
3. Make your changes
4. Ensure your code follows the project's coding standards
5. Submit a pull request to `develop`

options.label: Advanced Contributing
options.content:
1. Fork the repository
2. Create a new branch based on `develop`
3. Make your changes, including tests
4. Ensure your code follows the project's coding standards
5. Update documentation if needed
6. Submit a pull request to `develop`

options.label: Basic Support
options.content: For support, please contact [support@example.com](mailto:support@example.com).

options.label: Community Support
options.content: For support, join our community on [Slack](https://example.slack.com) or open an issue on [GitHub](https://github.com/example/repo/issues).

options.label: Enterprise Support
options.content: For enterprise support, contact our sales team at [enterprise@example.com](mailto:enterprise@example.com).
